name: elements of palafitoland
description:
[BETA] This is a work in progress may contain bug and errors if you find one please report it in the comments thanks.

Travel to the land of palafitoland and use the elemental powers to defeat evil.

Controls

Capture elemental power to recharge energy

Use the correct element to counteract the enemy elementals.

Water beats Fire
Fire beats Plant
Plant beats Water
